titles.title: RESERVE Federal Land Act
RESERVE Federal Land Act
Review and Evaluation of Strategies for Equitable Reservations for Visitor Experiences Federal Land Act
To require the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with the National Academy of Sciences to carry out a study on reservation systems for Federal land.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
